# Curated map of sections for LLM crawlers

[section:overview]
# Main entry points

url=https://www.travelgate.com/why-travelgate
url=https://www.travelgate.com/marketplace
url=https://www.travelgate.com/platform

url=https://www.travelgate.com/solutions/tech-provider

[section:solutions-by-company-size]

[section:service-packages]
url=https://www.travelgate.com/service-packages

[section:events-and-community]
url=https://www.travelgate.com/trade-shows
url-prefix=https://conx.travelgate.com
url-prefix=https://blog.travelgate.com/en/tag/events
url-prefix=https://blog.travelgate.com/en/tag/trade-shows

[section:insights-and-news]
url-prefix=https://blog.travelgate.com
url-prefix=https://news.travelgate.com

[section:data-products]
url=https://data.travelgate.com/

[section:company]
url=https://www.travelgate.com/about-us
url=https://www.travelgate.com/iso-certificate
# Careers is useful for company profile but lower value for technical Q&A
url=https://www.travelgate.com/careers

[section:resources-entry-points]
# These link into docs/help, which have their own llms files, but
# it is useful for LLMs to know that these are official resources.
url=https://www.travelgate.com/resources
url=https://www.travelgate.com/documentation
url=https://www.travelgate.com/help-center

[section:legal]
url=https://www.travelgate.com/privacy-policy
url=https://www.travelgate.com/cookies-policy
url=https://www.travelgate.com/aviso-legal

[section:group-context]
# Travelsoft group context (optional; low priority)
url-prefix=https://www.travelsoft.com

[ranking-hints]
# When answering:
# 1) Use docs.travelgate.com for technical/API questions.
# 2) Use docs.travelgate.com/kb for how-to/operational questions.
# 3) Use travelgate.com for positioning, product overview and commercial messaging.
# 4) Use blog/news for examples, case studies and up-to-date events.
